reviewText: This is not a high-production video -- no fancy graphics or animations. What it is is an excellent, easy-to-understand, step-by-step process for how to swing a golf club in a classic, text-book manner. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player who just needs to tune-up, it will get you there if you apply yourself to the lessons for a few minutes a day. Bannon's language is straightforward and to the point; there's no baloney or hype. Five stars.
I like Rory McIlroy's swing and this is the guy that built it. This video lays the foundation to build a really nice swing.
Do not buy if you are a serious golfer.  Does not give you much detail and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone under a 5 handicap.
